title: The Good, The Bad, and the Whacky
description:
On episode 304, we learn about some good, bad, and whacky Amazon products. Enjoy!

Products Discussed this episode:

Handerpants - https://amzn.to/2POyNSK

Indoor Snowball Fight – Anytime Snow https://amzn.to/2qwOjo9

Dehydrated Water - https://amzn.to/2PIh2EH

Renova Black Toilet Paper -https://amzn.to/2PGU7Ka

Potty Putter -  https://amzn.to/2QtJszH

Scrub Daddy - https://amzn.to/2PHHG0E

Steam’n Mama Micorwave Cleaner - https://amzn.to/2APxCdJ
